biography:
Didier Bourdon (born 23 January 1959) is a French Algerian-born actor, screenwriter and film director.

He first reached stardom in France when he created the comedic trio Les Inconnus with Bernard Campan and Pascal LÃ©gitimus, which was very popular throughout the 1990s.
